successes.title: Flare Audio - a revolution in pure sound IEM earphones
successes.description: Distortion free, pressure-balanced IEM in-ear earphones and headphones from the re-inventors of the loudspeaker.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU for supporting Flare. Your contribution will help bring our revolutionary pure sound to music fans around the world. We can't wait to share our progress with you.

FOUNDER LEVEL BACKER 
You'll be credited as a founder level backer in a dedicated section of the Flare website. Your generous contribution will help bring our revolutionary pure sound to music fans around the world. We can't wait to share our progress with you.

R2A BLACK (SUPER EARLY BACKER)
Our revolutionary distortion free, pressure-balanced earphones. Robust precision-turned aluminium construction with black anodised finish. Micro 5mm neodymium driver and black anti-tangle cable. Comply™ professional grade memory foam tips. Unique user-replaceable cable and driver assembly. 55% off the MSRP of £175 and limited to 750 units. Worldwide shipping is included at no extra cost. Act fast to get yours! Thanks for your support!

R2A BLACK (SUPER EARLY BACKER 2) 
Our revolutionary distortion free, pressure-balanced earphones. Robust precision-turned aluminium construction with black anodised finish. Micro 5mm neodymium driver and black anti-tangle cable. Thanks for your support!
